author: cms-sw
body:
GHSA-pq7m-3gw7-gq5x
Vulnerable versions: >= 7.17.0, < 7.31.1
Patched version: 7.31.1
Wed like to disclose an arbitrary code execution vulnerability in IPython that stems from IPython executing untrusted files in CWD. This vulnerability allows one user to run code as another.
title: update ipython  to get a security fix
